metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18244 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The stereo_processing function in libavcodec/aacps.c in Libav 12.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted aac file, related to ff_ps_apply.

notes.Note: ebarretto> No fix available as of 2019-03-01

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
